title: Lithuania Asylum Applications
description: Asylum Applications in Lithuania decreased to 50 persons in August from 70 persons in July of 2022. Asylum Applications in Lithuania averaged 56.34 persons from 2009 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 1460 persons in August of 2021 and a record low of 0 persons in July of 2013. Asylum Application in this page refers to first time asylum applicants. Data is supplied to Trading Economics by the Eurostat, National Ministries of Interior and other official agencies.
author: EUROSTAT
